name: Kinesis
tagline: We turn marketing into an engine for growth.
description:
Kinesis is a marketing and business consultancy, and the only firm with a business model designed exclusively to help B2B, service-centric businesses grow. 
Our proprietary philosophy, Marketing From the Inside Out®,.is a radically different approach to marketing which targets the core of your company and gravitates outward. We help you isolate the true essence of your brand, articulate your remarkability, and then make it a living, breathing part of your business identity.
We created Marketing from the Inside Out® to help business leaders profitably increase customer retention, streamline their sales process, and open the tap of qualified leads. We’re fanatical about helping service-centric companies grow, thrive, and build great cultures.
We enable companies to have an entire marketing department, led by a Chief Marketing Officer, for less than the price of one full-time employee.
